short_summary: Repair of the lower gauge station of Sault Ste. Marie
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: The deadline for submission is October 24, 2023, at 2:00 PM EDT. The contractor will perform removal and surface preparation of the existing deteriorated concrete, dowelling of additional reinforcing bars, and poured concrete to restore the bearing area over the existing caissons.
